page.title: 13CUSTOMS
page.content: Living in our grid are many members of the aristocracy. Balcarres House is the home of the Earl and Countess of Crawford and Balcarres. He is the premier earl of Scotland. His mother,the Dowager Lady Crawford, also lives in the house. The Earl and Countess of Lindsay live at Lahill House while their son and heir,Viscount Garnock and his wife have nearby Coates House. A second son,The Hon.John Lindsay-Bethune lives at Muircambus House. At Charleton House live the Baron St Clair Bonde and the Baroness, and Baron and Baroness Bonde (senior) live in a house in the grounds. The Baron's is a Swedish title.
